text:
""Find a Registered Dietitian."" Users can enter their address or ZIP code for a list of dietitians in their area. A person looking for dietary advice to prevent kidney damage should click on ""Renal (Kidney) Nutrition"" in the specialty field. Dietitians who specialize in helping people with CKD are called renal dietitians.
